fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data

Class AbstractPersistenceBackendFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data.AbstractPersistenceBackendFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceBackendFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlueprintsPersistenceBackendFactory, HBasePersistenceBackendFactory, MapDbPersistenceBackendFactory

    public abstract class AbstractPersistenceBackendFactory
extends Object
implements PersistenceBackendFactory
    An abstract PersistenceBackendFactory that processes common store options and manages the configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • getStoreOptions

        @Nonnull
protected static List<PersistentStoreOptions> getStoreOptions(@Nullable
                                                                        Map<?,?> options)
        Parses the store options from the given options.

        The store options must be a List<PersistentStoreOptions> registered with the PersistentResourceOptions.STORE_OPTIONS key.

        Parameters:
        options - the options
        Returns:
        a immutable list of store options

      • getName

        protected abstract String getName()
        Returns the literal description of the created PersistenceBackend.

        the literal description of the created PersistenceBackend

      • createPersistentStore

        public PersistentStore createPersistentStore(PersistentResource resource,
                                             PersistenceBackend backend,
                                             Map<?,?> options)
                                      throws InvalidDataStoreException
        Description copied from interface: PersistenceBackendFactory
        Creates a PersistentStore between the given resource and the given backend according to the given options.

        The returned PersistentStore may be a succession of several PersistentStore.

        Specified by:
        createPersistentStore in interface PersistenceBackendFactory
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource
        backend - the back-end
        options - the options that defines the behaviour of the back-end
        Returns:
        the newly created persistent store.
        Throws:
        InvalidDataStoreException - if there is at least one invalid value in options, or if an option is missing

      • createSpecificPersistentStore

        protected abstract PersistentStore createSpecificPersistentStore(PersistentResource resource,
                                                                 PersistenceBackend backend,
                                                                 Map<?,?> options)
                                                          throws InvalidDataStoreException
        Creates a PersistentStore between the given resource and the given backend according to the given options.

        The returned PersistentStore may be a succession of several PersistentStore.

        Contrary to createPersistentStore(PersistentResource, PersistenceBackend, Map), this method is associated to a specific PersistenceBackend, and called before creating global PersistentStore.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource
        backend - the back-end
        options - the options
        Returns:
        the newly created persistent store
        Throws:
        InvalidDataStoreException - if there is at least one invalid value in options, or if an option is missing

      • processGlobalConfiguration

        protected void processGlobalConfiguration(File directory)
                                   throws InvalidDataStoreException
        Creates and saves the NeoEMF configuration.

        The configuration is stored as a properties file beside a database in order to identify a PersistenceBackend.

        Parameters:
        directory - the directory where the configuration must be stored
        Throws:
        InvalidDataStoreException - if the configuration cannot be created in the directory
